title: #379: BONUS: Johnny Depp v. Amber Heard
description:
Team Johnny? Team Amber? So many people are engrossed in the disturbing, lurid and salacious details of the defamation case between actors/ex spouses Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, they can hardly talk about anything else. It has brought out the worst in both the public and those in the media and made them forget this is real life with farther reaching consequences than if Captain Jack Sparrow wins or loses in the end. 

Join us as we review the case, the legal ramifications and how to discern the truth from all the drama. 

#amberheard, #johnnydepp #defamation #courtroomdrama #domesticabuse #sexualabuse
